title: **Amazing CC Studio Apt** All utilities included
description:
*All* utilities included (water, electric, heat, everything)! This unit is for rent by a local owner, and is available starting 5/1. Email to schedule a viewing, any day of the week works.
Live in the heart of Philadelphia's shopping, dining, and entertainment district at the Arts Condominium! With sweeping skyline views of Center City, this studio offers a variety of features, including large windows for natural light, updated original details, and much more. The building has a front desk attendant in the lobby 24/7 for extra security, a bike storage room, a free on-site fitness center, large laundry facilities that are always open, a business center, and computer terminals with free WiFi internet in the lobby. A few steps away from Broad Street, you'll be near public transit options and everything downtown Philadelphia has to offer, including nearby hotspots like the Avenue of the Arts, Rittenhouse Square, and City Hall.
Easy access to public transit:
- Broad Street Line (express and local) Walnut/Locust stop is across the street
- Market-Frankford via City Hall a couple blocks away
- Suburban Station a 10 minute walk away

title: Sunny 3 bdrm Fairmount
description: Spacious, sunny apartment in the Art Museum area! Come preview this clean  3 bedroom, one bathroom, (double vanity) and large great room, bi-level, 1600 sq ft unit. Hardwood floors throughout, exposed brick, basement storage, washer & dryer (coin op), microwave, dishwasher, gas stove, garbage disposal, and tons of natural light. There's even a view of the City skyline from one of the bedrooms. Pets welcome with deposit. This second floor walk up is tucked in a 3 stort row on the cherry tree lined Poplar St, conveniently located close to everything the Art Museum area has to offer: dining, coffee shops, Boathouse Row, Museums and close to Center City. Easy access to 4 bus/trolley routes. The Landlord pays for water. Tenants pay for gas and electric. First month rent and one month's security required before move in. Available now.

title: Beautiful 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment
description:
Beautiful 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment with private entrance at the rear of the property in a quiet residential neighborhood. Home offers living room with fireplace and high ceilings, informal dining area with built-in nook and formal dining area, laundry room with hook-ups for washer and dryer, 1bathroom (no tubs), kitchen with granite counter tops and room for bar seating. Kitchen has new flooring, stainless steel sink and faucet, gas range, dishwasher, and lots of cupboards and countertop space. Bedroom area includes a fireplace and looks out on the back yard. Prefer no smokers. Will consider one small pet or animal. Freshly cleaned. EV hook-up inside 1-car garage. Conveniently located close to schools, stores and shopping. title: Welcome to your new home that was just fully renovated!
description:
Welcome to your new home that was just fully renovated! The large open kitchen features stainless steel appliances and a large window over the sink to the open living space beyond. Down the hall you will find a bathroom and large closest, before entering the huge bedroom, which best provides access to your large, enclosed, PRIVATE back yard. The lower level is all yours as well, and here you'll find plenty of clean storage space and your own washer/dryer. This is an absolutely unbeatable location; a beautiful, walkable neighborhood with quick and easy access to University City and Center City. Highly desirable Greenfield school catchment. Too many local favorites and locations within walking distance to list -- Schuylkill River Trail, Fitler Square, Rival Bros Coffee, Amazon Hub Locker, to name a few. Your rent includes water, tenant responsible for all other utilities.

title: This Stunning Corner and Rare Condo That is a Fully Renovated Find
description:
This stunning corner and rare condo that is a fully renovated find, with many luxurious upgrades such as quartz countertops and luxury flooring throughout is in the heart of Washington Square. Everything in this unit is brand new, from the designer kitchen with stainless steel appliances to the upgraded bathroom, interior lighting, custom window treatments, and professionally painted interiors. This 2 bedroom, 1 bath unit provides spacious living in the heart of vibrant Washington Sq West, with nearby theaters, fine dining, coffee shops, top medical centers, idyllic parks, and myriad shopping options that offer a high quality, convenient standard of living. With no other tenants on the floor, this special unit is very private. Upon entering, the main living space is airy and open, with lots of natural light from a wall of windows at the front and side, and window treatments that can be raised or lowered for added privacy. The entire condo features modern, engineered hardwood floors. The tasteful kitchen offers upgraded gray cabinetry, white quartz waterfall counters, stainless steel appliances, Calacatta tile backsplash, deep double sinks, under cabinet hidden outlets, a large appliance cubby, pantry, an extended peninsula with pendant lighting, and comfortable seating for two or more. The primary master suite features a large bedroom, a walk-in closet, and a luxurious full bathroom with designer tile, a glass-enclosed shower, and dual access pocket doors. The second bedroom also has a walk-in closet. The entry hall includes multiple closets for coats, a washer/ dryer hook-up space, an electric water heater, and the central HVAC. FURNISHED options available. ** Prices subject to change on daily basis *
301 S 11th St #101

title: Make this New York-style loft in the heart of Logan Square
description:
Make this New York-style loft in the heart of Logan Square with a 1-car deeded garage spot your new home! This great condo features high ceilings, original architectural details, exposed ducts and hardwood floors throughout. The home boasts an open concept-living area with exposed brick, oversized windows with Eastern exposure and exciting city skyline views, and is perfect for entertaining. The roomy kitchen provides generous counter space, modern cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops and a large island with ample seating space. The main level also includes two large bedrooms with lots of closet space, a full marble bath, a laundry closet with a full-size stacked washer/dryer and a coat closet. A custom metal staircase adorns the stairs leading to the main bedroom, complete with a large walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom featuring a spacious walk-in shower. 2200 Arch St also provides amazing amenities, including a 24-hour monitored entrance, concierge, on-site garage parking, fitness center, Arch Gourmet convenience store on the ground floor and it is pet friendly. The location is extremely convenient and walkable, just steps away from Trader Joe’s and GIANT stores, the Schuylkill River Trail, close to 30th Street Station, Rittenhouse and Logan Squares, many restaurants, cafes, shopping and the museums including The Franklin Institute and The Barnes. Easy access to I-76 and I-676 makes this location perfect for commuters and city dwellers alike. Disclaimer: Property is listed for sale and might be sold during the lease period. Tenants would have to agree to showings during their lease.
2200 Arch St #207

title: This urban hub is one of Philadelphia's most desirable neighborhoods
description:
Center City West is a neighborhood within Center City, the downtown district of Philadelphia. This urban hub is one of Philadelphia's most desirable neighborhoods. The Center City West neighborhood encompasses some of the city's biggest attractions including the shopping, financial, and museum districts. It attracts its residents by not only hosting some of the city's leading institutions of art, science, and history, but also with its upscale restaurants and a booming nightlife. The options are endless: Laugh tears of joy at the Helium Comedy Club, have a shopping spree at the Shops at Liberty Place, or get a spectacular panoramic view 57 stories above the ground at the One Liberty Observation Deck. Nearby Rittenhouse Square is a popular spot for festivals and farmers markets while the Schuylkill Banks has excellent riverside running and biking trails with a view.
105 S 18th Street S #5C

title: A Living Room Worth Living In!
description:
Welcome to this beautiful townhome in desirable Knolls of Birmingham! Looking for maintenance free living with scenic walking trails, a real pond, pool and tennis and pickleball courts? How about snow shoveled up to your front door and garage? Complete lawn and landscaping care? Located in award winning Unionville-Chadds Ford Schools including Blue Ribbon Chadds Ford Elementary, this maintenance free 3 bedroom, 3.5 bath home has been beautifully updated and improved throughout. The main level living space includes a spacious light filled living room with full size gas burning fireplace, gleaming hardwood floors throughout, many windows, an adjacent dining area all overlooking a scenic large rear yard area with woods and open space. The rear facing deck offers privacy and peace as you enjoy the park like setting and sunsets. The large eat in kitchen has plenty of newer beautiful wood cabinetry, granite counters, stainless appliances, tiled backsplash and large breakfast, lunch or dinner nook. Just down the main level hall is the custom pantry, updated half bath and a mud room area perfect for show storage just inside the large 2 car garage. The second level offers a cavernous primary suite offering his & hers walk-in closets with custom closet systems, an en suite full bath with large soaking tub, tiled shower stall, large double vanity and linen closet. The second bedroom with walk in closet and full hall bath complete the second level. The third level stairs offer a skylight on the way to the 3rd bedroom which offers a full en suite bath and plenty of closet space. The lower level finished basement offers great ceiling height, full size window, second half bath and could either be a large 2nd family room, game room, home office or sleeping area in addition to the laundry and large storage area. The exterior features newer James Hardie Plank siding, new soffit and fascia, oversize gutters, roof and fabulous exterior lighting and landscaping. Truly maintenance free living at it's finest! The Knolls of Birmingham is a wonderful walking community with a paved trail system, beautiful open space, a community pool and clubhouse, private tennis/pickle ball courts and the walking trail is connected to the incredible Sandy Hollow Battlefield park and trail system adding miles of extra scenic and historic open space. It's like being on vacation all year long. This home is very efficient with very low utility costs. Knolls Of Birmingham is located in the Historic Brandywine Valley just a short drive to world class attractions such as Longwood Gardens, Winterthur, many private golf courses, swim clubs, Brandywine River Museum, and many other historical attractions. Easy access to the routes 202, 1, 322, 95 and upscale restaurants, shopping, Award winning Unionville Chadds Ford schools.
To see the home at 411 Homestead Dr. or for more information please call Jim at  show contact info
.

title: beautiful house for rent
description:
As you approach this house, the first thing that catches your eye is the abundant open space, a unique feature in a neighborhood typically filled with rowhomes. As you enter, you're immediately struck by the abundance of natural light flooding the space.
The main living area features a semi-open floor plan with large windows and glass doors, which create a seamless connection to the outdoors. The walls are painted white and neutral colors to reflect even more natural light, making the space feel bright and airy.
The kitchen cabinets are made of warm wood and are accented with newer appliances.
The dining area, which is adjacent to the kitchen, is filled with natural wood (and new hardwood floors). The living room features plenty of space for you to arrange comfortable seating, perfect for entertaining guests or curling up with a good book.
The newly carpeted master bedroom is located on the second level and boasts several windows that flood the space with natural light. There is an en-suite bathroom as well.
Also upstairs, there are two additional bedrooms, both newly carpeted, each with their own windows and plenty of natural light. A shared bathroom allows even more natural light to filter into the space.
Outside, the backyard is a peaceful oasis with plenty of space for outdoor entertaining. Make this yard your own with a garden, grill or hang out around the fire pit!
Overall, this freestanding style home is a perfect blend of warmth, comfort, and natural light, making it an inviting and welcoming place to call home.
Central air conditioning. Driveway parking for 2 cars; off street parking for additional parking. In-unit washer/dryer. Now available for showings.

Close access to hiking, running, and biking trails.
3/4 mile away from Wissahickon Valley park trail head

3/4 mile to SEPTA Ivy Ridge Train Station & Bus stops

Convenient commute to Conshohocken, Plymouth Meeting, Main Line, Bala Cynwyd, Villanova, St. Joseph's U, Drexel U, PCOM, Temple, Philly U. Center City, City Ave., etc.
